channel.title: dplyr on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in dplyr on A Hugo website

item.title: Dplyr data combining
item.description: Dplyr data combining library(dplyr) a = data.frame(x1=c('A','B','C'), x2=c(1,2,3)) b = data.frame(x1=c('A','B','D'), x3=c('T','F','T')) a ## x1 x2 ## 1 A 1 ## 2 B 2 ## 3 C 3 b ## x1 x3 ## 1 A T ## 2 B F ## 3 D T left_join(a, b, by='x1') ## Warning: Column `x1` joining factors with different levels, coercing to ## character vector ## x1 x2 x3 ## 1 A 1 T ## 2 B 2 F ## 3 C 3 <NA>
